caption.p: (A) Zn|AC–ZnCl 2Br 2I 2 coin cells charged at 1.0 A g –1 (left-hand vertical axis) and discharged at 0.05 A g –1 (right-hand vertical axis) using the WiTS gel electrolyte and (B) capacity retention and Coulombic efficiency of the Zn|AC–ZnCl 2Br 2I 2 cell cycled at 0.75 A g –1 using the WiTS gel electrolyte.
